tools

Class FileQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.FileQueue

  • public class FileQueue
extends java.lang.Object
    FileQueue class is an structure just for helping associate a file path to some action.
    Author:
    vliopard

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public void set(int action,
       java.lang.String pathAndFile)
        This method sets a pair of action and path to the file that suffers the action.
        Parameters:
        action - A int that contains the action representing number.
        pathAndFile - A String containing the path to the file related to the action.

      • getType

        public int getType()
        This method informs what is the action is file suffered.
        Returns:
        Returns an int that represents the type of action: Settings.FileCreated, Settings.FileModified, Settings.FileDeleted and Settings.FileRenamed.

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        This method informs the file that is suffering some action.
        Returns:
        Returns a String containing the path to the file that is associated to a typeOfAction.
